action.action-desc: Mr. Issa (for himself and Mr. Correa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to grant the Supreme Court of the United States security-related authorities equivalent to the legislative and executive branches.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supreme Court Police Parity Act of 2022.
